local_intent: Local 'place' execution: ensure red_plate is observed, approach and align, lower slowly until contact, verify contact, release the white plate, and retreat.
assumptions: White plate is securely held in the gripper from the prior pick step
Red plate is within reach and stable on the work surface
Perception (camera) can detect the red_plate after a scan if not already visible
coherence_with_global: Implements the GLOBAL_BT placement phase from GLOBAL_DESCRIPTION: localizes red_plate, aligns, performs LowerUntilContact with slow speed and low force threshold, verifies contact, opens gripper to release, and retreats.
